name: Slot_machine_man
text:
Slot machine man
An unidentified man was a slots-playing guest at the Silver Mustang Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Biography
As Dale Cooper watched curiously, the man inserted a quarter into his slots machine and pulled the lever, triumphantly shouting "Hello!" when he won a prize. Cooper, in a childlike state, began mimicking the man's actions as he proceeded to play and win one slots game after another.
